review: Whatever i mentioned above is not correct i had to do that as that were Mandatory fields. We had an appointment with doc at 10.30 am and we reqched there in time but doc was not available. We waited for an hour and come back and we have not been given any other time slot rather we have been told jab doc aa jaayenge tau bata denge and he will be in the hospital by 3 pm.  Finally we couldnt see the doc. There might be some issue that doc didnt turn so this is not at all against the Doc, however Hospital staff must have provided the next appointment. It was not good experience with practo at all. Please see below.

Very good experience with Dr. Saket. He did an emergency angioplasty for my father. Ww are veey satisfied with the results.
Later, he took time to explain the next steps to us. He was very patient with our queries and answered every single question we had. I would definitely recommend him.

Dr Saket is good,listened me very carefully n try to find out the root cause of problem.
His behavior was also good with patient.

I visited doctor on Saturday he advise some medicine seeing the report . He did some change in the medication carried on based on diabetic condition. To my surprise, the next day in Sunday we have to visit EMERGENCY. ** *** **** ******* *** **** *** **** *** *** ********* ************ ***** *** ******* *** ****** ***** **** ***** It put question mark on the seriousness of the doctor with the doctor. 

He is good with his words only  what I experience.
Patient* ************ *** had given time to understand the case. He gave right suggestion and understood the condition of patient.
The best experience with a doctor so far.He examined me properly without any haste.Unneccessary medication was avoided.I will rate 10/10.
very caring & friendly experience with him..I 'll definitely recommend him to my friends & relatives....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** **** ************* *** experienced. Yet he is very humble and down-to-earth.He explains the illness in detail. He spends time with the patient and answers his queries to his satisfaction.Above all, he is very ethical in his practice and prescribes only the relevant medicines.

context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: When I was suffering from a chest, so I approached Dr. Saket Bhardwaj, and I also saw that he did the check very well
Excellent dr in cardiology, with ample experience. Deals nicely with the patients. Wonderful experience
